description: Check out the first look of the upcoming card game set for Star Wars: Unlimited, Shadows of the Galaxy, featuring The Mandalorian, Moff Gideon, and more!
title: Star Wars: Unlimited - Official Shadows of the Galaxy Teaser Trailer

description: Disney Plus will be cracking down on password sharing, according to CEO Bob Iger who made the announcement on CNBC, saying that Disney will be launching its first foray into policing password sharing in certain countries and a few markets this summer, which is expected to be rolled out to all subscribers come September. This whole password sharing crackdown trend was set by Netflix last year, with many other subscription services following suit similar to #DisneyPlus. In fact, last year Netflix boasted a significant increase in subscriptions after both cracking down on password sharing and increasing its subscription prices of its tiers. Plus some Marvel and Star Wars news in today’s fix of entertainment news.
title: Disney Plus Password Sharing Crackdown Rolls Out Very Soon - IGN The Fix: Entertainment

description:
In today's Daily Fix:
For better or worse, Stellar Blade is already drumming up plenty of discussion online, and it's not even out yet. But one thing gamers will be happy to hear about is post-launch costume DLC and New Game Plus will be free (with some exceptions, like cross-brand collabs). Developer Shift Up also hasn't ruled out paid DLC, but you can expect the first wave of content to be free. In other news, CD Projekt Red has confirmed that several easter eggs in Cyberpunk 2077 still haven't been discovered, despite the base game being out for more than three years. And finally, the highly-anticipated Star Wars Outlaws gets a new trailer next week, this one focusing on the story.
title: Stellar Blade DLC Costumes and New Game+ Will Be Free Post-Launch - IGN Daily Fix

description: PowerWash Simulator VR is the ultimate powerwashing simulation game developed by FuturLab. Take a look at the teaser trailer to get a glimpse at the upcoming SpongeBob SquarePants Special Pack that allows players to clean up the iconic sights of Bikini Bottom. From Conch Street, The Bikini Bottom Bus, The Krusty Krab, The Patty Wagon, The Invisible Boatmobile, and the Mermalair, players will get all the nostalgia of the iconic Nickelodeon show. The SpongeBob SquarePants Special Pack for PowerWash Simulator VR is launching on April 11 for Meta Quest 2, 3, and Pro.
title: PowerWash Simulator VR x SpongeBob SquarePants - Official Special Pack Teaser Trailer

description:
Decadent is a story-driven exploration first-person shooter developed by Incantation Games. Players will step into the role of World War 1 veteran John Lorn as he embarks on a quest to save his son. Through uncovering an ancient secret, John will be tested in combat alongside the nature of his own humanity and mortality. Venture into lightless forests, frozen tundras, hostile cliffs, and more while unlocking new equipment such as 1920’s firearms to alien bio-weapons. Decadent is launching in 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Decadent - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer

description: It's Friday and we've got some more deals and preorders for you to check out, including one of the best movies about a robotic cop ever made, functional Fortnite swag and a shiny new graphics card deal.
title: Robocop 2 4K Preorders and a Fortnite Fridge: IGN Deals #ign #shorts #deals #robocop #fortnite

description:
Another large-scale update has hit Palworld, and with it comes some exciting new changes that shake the game up a bit. From new altars to utilize, pals that drop some super useful things in the Ranch, new stat-boosting fruits, and more, there is plenty of new content to enjoy. Let's take a look at the biggest changes to hit Palworld in the latest Raid Boss update.
 
00:00 Intro
00:22 New Summoning Altar
01:18 New Homeward Thundercloud Item
02:11 New Recovery Meds
03:12 New Items at the Ranch
03:44 Training Manuals
04:35 More Palworld tips!

For more Palworld, check out our full Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/palworld

#IGN #Gaming #Palworld
title: Palworld: Biggest Changes in Update 0.2.0.6 | Raid Boss Update

description:
Stellar Blade is an action RPG developed by Shift Up. Take a look at the latest character vignette to meet the Tachy, the courageous leader of the 7th Airborne Squad. Tachy is a decorated soldier, renowned for her tactical acumen, combat, and survival skills. Stellar Blade is launching on April 26 for PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#Gaming #StellarBlade #IGN
title: Stellar Blade - Official Tachy Character Trailer

description:
The Mummy follows the story of American adventurer Rick O’Connell (Fraser) as he leads an expedition to Hamunaptra, the legendary city of the dead. There, alongside Egyptologist Evelyn Carnahan (Weisz) and her brother Jonathan (Hannah), he unwittingly awakens Imhotep (Vosloo), an ancient Egyptian priest cursed to suffer eternal damnation. Imhotep seeks to resurrect his lost love, and the team must race against time to stop him before he unleashes unspeakable horrors on the world.

The Mummy will return to theaters nationwide on April 26, 2024.

#IGN #Movies
title: The Mummy - Official 25th Anniversary Trailer (2024) Brendan Fraser, Rachel Weisz

description:
New Arc Line is a steampunk story-based tactical CRPG developed by Dreamate. Players will engage in a struggle against the forces of Arcane Magic and the Steampunk Revolution. The balance is compromised against sorcery, elves, dwarves, and mysterious monsters on one side and steampunk gadgets, zeppelins, and Tesla guns on the other. Make critical decisions and ultimately decide the side you will choose and who you will become. New Arc Line is launching in 2024 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#Gaming #IGN #NewArcLine
title: New Arc Line - Official Story Trailer

description:
Who are the 25 top wrestlers of all time? With WrestleMania 40 just around the corner, there's no better time to discuss the best wrestlers ever! From ‘Stone Cold’ Steve Austin, John Cena, and The Rock to Ric Flair and The Undertaker, the competition has been fierce over the years. So, we turned to you to see who you think deserves to make the cut in our top 25 list of the greatest wrestlers of all time. Sit back and relax as we guide you through the hall of fame of your favorite wrestling legends, covering all eras, WWE wrestlers, and beyond.Who’s your favorite wrestler of all time?
Let us know in the comments.

description:
Hear from the legendary Todd Howard, executive producer James Altman, and more on the process behind adapting the iconic RPG series to Amazon’s post-apocalyptic sci-fi series. 

Fallout is the story of haves and have-nots in a world in which there’s almost nothing left to have. Two-hundred years after the apocalypse, the gentle denizens of luxury fallout shelters are forced to return to the irradiated hellscape their ancestors left behind—and are shocked to discover an incredibly complex, gleefully weird, and highly violent universe waiting for them. 

The series comes from Kilter Films and executive producers Jonathan Nolan and Lisa Joy. Nolan directed the first three episodes. Geneva Robertson-Dworet and Graham Wagner serve as executive producers, writers, and co-showrunners. 

Fallout stars Ella Purnell (Yellowjackets), Aaron Moten (Emancipation) and Walton Goggins (The Hateful Eight). Athena Wickham of Kilter Films also executive produces, along with Todd Howard for Bethesda Game
title: Fallout - Official "Console to Camera" Behind the Scenes Clip (2024) Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten

description:
The time of the Arisen is upon us, and you have been chosen as the Dragon’s adversary. It’s going to take a lot of adventuring to get to that point though, as there are plenty of complicated systems to wrap your mind around such as Pawns, Vocations, Portcrystals, and more! Don’t worry Arisen, we’re here to help you land on your feet so you can tackle all of the dangers that lie ahead of you in Dragon’s Dogma 2!

Presented by the United States Air Force
title: Dragon's Dogma 2: How Pawns, Vocations, Portcrystals (And More!) Work

description:
Palworld is an online co-op multiplayer open-world survival crafting game developed by Pocket Pair. Take a look at the latest gameplay trailer for Bellanoir, a Pal that watches over the world and is thought to not exist. Palworld is available now for Xbox One, Xbox Series S|X, and PC.

#Palworld #Gaming #IGN
title: Palworld - Official Bellanoir Gameplay Trailer

description:
Content Warning has taken the internet by storm with its family-friendly brand of jumpscare horror and overall YouTube vibes. But popular doesn’t equal perfect, so if you’re looking to enhance your experience with some sweet mods, we’ve got you covered. This guide will show you where to get mods, teach you how to get them working, and make a few fun recommendations.

description:
Check out gameplay, boss fights, and more from Biomorph in this launch trailer for the hand-drawn Metroidvania adventure game. In Biomorph, you don't just defeat enemies; you conquer and absorb their powers to evolve into a formidable force. Each creature you vanquish transforms you, granting new abilities for combat and exploration. Biomorph is available now on Steam.

#Gaming #Games #Biomorph
title: Biomorph - Official Launch Trailer

description:
Facial capture in video games hasn’t always been easy. Before developers had the option to capture an actor's performance with an iPhone and a decent PC, It required a ton of space and specialized gear. You know the gear I’m talking about, the suits with the sensors and those headsets with cameras that track the dots on actors' faces? The point is, it’s quite expensive.
That’s all about to change, let's take a look at how the intersection of technology and art has changed the way productions look at facial capture and how facial capture technology has helped make games look more cinematic.
title: How Facial Capture Tech Has Made Games More Cinematic

description:
The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road is an upcoming addition to the fantasy MMO RPG developed by ZeniMax Studios. Players will explore and defend a new portion of Skingrad that has fallen under the control of the Daedric cult. Customize skills with the Scribing system and dispatch the dangers threatening the West Weald. Take a look at the gameplay trailer for The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road, launching on June 3 for Mac and PC with a release on PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, and Xbox Series S|X on June 18.

#TheElderScrollsOnlineGoldRoad #TheElderScrolls #IGN #Gaming
title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Gold Road - Official Gameplay Trailer

description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch. This week Daemon is joined by Podcast Beyond's Max Scoville and Jada Griffin. The topic: games that are already announced that we don't think we'll see until next-gen (PlayStation 6 and whatever the next Xbox will be called). The Elder Scrolls VI was announced during the previous PS4/Xbox One era, it's very likely we won't be playing it on the PS5/Xbox Series X. We also know Naughty Dog is working on something, but it's not that cancelled The Last of Us multiplayer game, and it's possible that game will skip this gen and go to next. And let's not get started on Beyond Good and Evil 2, which was announced during the PS3/Xbox 360 era, went silent for years, showed up again about 5 years ago with new cinematics and gameplay footage, and has gone dark again. We also have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Witcher 4 & 9 Other Games We Don’t Expect This Gen - Next-Gen Console Watch

description:
Watch the latest Roblox trailer for BBC Wonder Chase, a new Roblox game featuring popular BBC shows, such as Doctor Who, Match of the Day, EastEnders, and The Next Step. Meet Gary Lineker, Zara McDermott, Louis Theroux, Hacker T Dog, and the Fifteenth Doctor (Ncuti Gatwa) in this new Roblox experience.

Test your skills in a selection of mini games and complete obstacle courses, collect BBC iPlayer-themed coins and stickers, and learn interesting nature facts along the way. Check out the trailer for a look at what to expect.

BBC Wonder Chase is free on Roblox, available on PC, mobile (iOS, Android), PlayStation, and Xbox consoles.

#Roblox #Gaming #BBC
title: Roblox: BBC Wonder Chase - Official Trailer

description:
Check out the Exoprimal x Mega Man collab trailer. The latest collaboration features six new Beta Variant Exosuits including Zephyr Beta: Boost Claws, Vigilant Beta: Bowhunter, Krieger Beta: Blitz Cannon, Murasame Beta: Windcaller, Witchdoctor Beta: Plasma Shot, and Nimbus Beta: Wild Bomb. Exofighters can also equip the following special collaboration cosmetic sets: Mega Man (Nimbus), Air Man (Witchdoctor), and Yellow Devil (Krieger). 

The Exoprimal Title Update 4 and Mega Man collaboration release date is April 17, 2024.

#Gaming #Exoprimal #MegaMan
title: Exoprimal x Mega Man - Official Collaboration Trailer

description:
With the live-action Fallout series making its debut on Prime Video on April 11, we’ve got a brief history lesson for all of you vault-dwellers, to get you up to speed on the state of the world before you embark on your journey in the wasteland.

Presented by Amazon Prime Video.
title: Leaving the Vault: A Brief History of Fallout Lore

description:
Want to learn how to speak with the Elves of the Sacred Arbor in Dragon's Dogma 2? It's actually fairly simple. Watch our quick How to Learn Elvish guide to find out how to hire a pawn with the Woodland Wordsmith Specialization, or how to find the scroll to teach it to your own pawn.

#IGN #Gaming #DragonsDogma2
title: Dragon's Dogma 2: How to Learn Elvish (Find Woodland Wordsmith Specialization)
